span.br:
To build tomorrow's future, the West Perry School District prepares, inspires, and empowers... every student, every day.
Vision Statement
The West Perry School District, in partnership with the community, prepares students dedicated to building positive relationships, maintaining high character, and achieving academic success; while possessing the global value necessary to thrive in an ever-changing, increasingly diverse world.
Shared Values
The West Perry School District believes the unique abilities, interests, needs, and goals of all students should be respected.
The West Perry School District believes family and community involvement are essential to each child's educational success.

span.span:
Parent Teacher Conferences can be scheduled online athttps://westperry.meettheteacher.com/
2020-2021 Kindergarten Registration packets have been mailed. If you did not receive a packet, contact Becky Lauzon at 717-789-3934 x5500.

br.br: Student accident coverage is available to purchase through W.J. Moore, Inc. There are several plans available for school time and 24 hour coverage. The coverage is in excess over any other coverage the student may have. Plans and coverages can be reviewed on the company website which is www.K12SpecialMarkets.com.If you have any questions or need help with enrollment, please call Robin at W.J. Moore, Inc. at 717-582-2189.
